channel.title: twitter Open Data Hot Posts
channel.description: I tweet a tema open data, che hanno ricevuto almeno 10 cuori o retweet

Another dishonesty, incompetency or habitual lying. I have just checked the Global poverty update which says on the basis of revised data of 2017-18, Pakistan poverty levels have increased from 2015-16 data. Two imp pts 1) it was PMLN term, 2) Data fudging https://t.co/kUWbUkke4N https://t.co/Mk8YoqpuPd

@OlafScholz Dann sind die #PIRATEN sicherlich eine gute Wahl: Zukunftslust, statt Angst und Frust. Wir stehen bspw. für Freiheit, Würde, Digitalisierung, Teilhabe, Mitbestimmung, Innovation, Transparenz und Open Data. Fakten basierte Politik auf wissenschaftlicher Grundlage #Zukunftscamp

@RediTlhabi I've always been a strong advocate for open data. Sure data can be manipulated to fit a certain narrative, but the benefits far outweigh the risks. Data can be such an important tool not only to inform policy but also to support communication efforts and drive behavioural change!

A healthier equilibrium would include: - Less gatekeeping of science prior to publication (more pre-prints) - Incentives to make work publicly legible (open data, hypothesis preregistration) - Funding for public peer review + replication of scientific work https://t.co/bYPHeCp78B

La ciencia abierta no es solo datos abiertos (open data), también tenemos que saber cómo se analizan esos datos (open methods). Dejarlo todo al sombrero mágico del algoritmo y al "tu no entenderías eso" puede ser usado y mal por los q buscan hechos alternativos y noticias falsas.

finding myself less motivated by #OpenScience lately—not b/c I find it any less critical, but b/c many basic tenets like open data/code, OA, (anon) open review are so unambiguously the right things to do. can we just get these done and move on to bigger problems lurking behind?
